other_tests.findings: Mild fatty change involving the liver parenchyma; mild peripancreatic edema and subtle enhancement of the peripancreatic fat at the tail; multiple filling defects in the gallbladder consistent with calculi; asymmetric edema surrounding the gallbladder; normal pancreatic duct measuring 3 mm; normal common bile duct measuring 6 mm; normal spleen; normal kidneys and adrenal glands; no abnormal lymph nodes; no free intraabdominal fluid.
